summary.intent: Add nesting guidance to the skill Instructions template placeholder so AI-generated SKILL.md files use indented sub-bullets for steps with sub-steps, improving readability.
summary.outcome: Updated the placeholder text in both template locations, verified with 1319 passing tests and clean lint, and committed only the two relevant files.

repo: The skill Instructions template placeholder is duplicated in two places that must stay in sync: the markdown prompt file and the inline TypeScript template string in prompt-generator.ts
Commands are run via an `rtk` prefix wrapper (e.g., `rtk bun run test`, `rtk git commit`), likely a remote toolkit or environment proxy

code.finding: Skill Instructions template placeholder — controls guidance given to AI when generating SKILL.md instruction sections
Inline TypeScript template string inside getSkillInstructions() — mirrors the markdown prompt file and must be kept in sync with it

workflow: Before committing, diff the full working tree to check for unrelated unstaged changes and scope the git add to only the task-relevant files
Test suite runs 1319 tests via `bun run test`

friction: Other unstaged changes existed in the repo at commit time, requiring explicit file-scoped `git add` to avoid accidentally bundling unrelated work
open_items: Other unstaged changes in the repo remain uncommitted and unaddressed
